stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine End the run.
text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Markus 1.0
